item.title: Trump signs order to withdraw U.S. from the World Health Organization
item.description: President Trump on Monday signed an executive order to withdraw the U.S. from the World Health Organization.

item.title: Trump said he'll impose 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico on Feb. 1
item.description: President Trump said he'll impose 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico beginning Feb. 1.
